Peripheral.Name: Embedded Flash
Peripheral.Description: The Flash memory interface manages CPU AHB I-Code and D-Code accesses to the Flash memory. It implements the erase and program Flash memory operations and the read and write protection mechanisms

Peripheral.Name: Data EEPROM
Peripheral.Description: Dummy config to support flash mapped at 0x0C000000

Peripheral.Name: OTP
Peripheral.Description: The Data OTP memory block. It contains the one time programmable bits.

Bit.Name: RDP_level
Bit.Description: Life state code.

Values.Val: Level 0
Level 2 with Boundary Scan
Level 2

Bit.Name: RDP_level
Bit.Description: Life state code.

Values.Val: Level 0
Level 2 with Boundary Scan
Level 2

Bit.Name: EDATA_EN
Bit.Description: Flash data area enable.
Bit.Val: No flash data area (EDATA sectors are 128 bits writable)
Flash data area is enabled (EDATA sectors are 16/32 bits writable)

Bit.Name: EDATA_EN
Bit.Description: Flash data area enable.
Bit.Val: No flash data area (EDATA sectors are 128 bits writable)
Flash data area is enabled (EDATA sectors are 16/32 bits writable)

Bit.Name: BOOT_SEL
Bit.Description: Boot 0 source selection
Bit.Val: BOOT0 signal is defined by the BOOT0 option bit.
BOOT0 signal is defined by BOOT0 pin value (legacy mode)

Bit.Name: BOOT_SEL
Bit.Description: Boot 0 source selection
Bit.Val: BOOT0 signal is defined by the BOOT0 option bit.
BOOT0 signal is defined by BOOT0 pin value (legacy mode)

Bit.Name: SINGLE_BANK
Bit.Description: Dual bank selection option status bit.
Bit.Val: User flash is split between bank 1 and bank 2
User flash is located in one bank

Bit.Name: SINGLE_BANK
Bit.Description: Dual bank selection option status bit.
Bit.Val: User flash is split between bank 1 and bank 2
User flash is located in one bank

Bit.Name: BOOT0
Bit.Description: Boot 0 option bit.
Bit.Val: BOOT0 = 0
BOOT0 = 1

Bit.Name: BOOT0
Bit.Description: Boot 0 option bit.
Bit.Val: BOOT0 = 0
BOOT0 = 1

Bit.Name: IWDG_STDBY
Bit.Description: Standby mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system standby mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system standby mode.

Bit.Name: IWDG_STDBY
Bit.Description: Standby mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system standby mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system standby mode.

Bit.Name: IWDG_STOP
Bit.Description: Stop mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system Stop mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system Stop mode.

Bit.Name: IWDG_STOP
Bit.Description: Stop mode freeze option status bit.
Bit.Val: Independent watchdog frozen in system Stop mode
Independent watchdog keep running in system Stop mode.

Bit.Name: SWAP_BANK
Bit.Description: Bank swapping option status bit.
Bit.Val: bank 1 and bank 2 not swapped
bank 1 and bank 2 swapped

Bit.Name: SWAP_BANK
Bit.Description: Bank swapping option status bit.
Bit.Val: bank 1 and bank 2 not swapped
bank 1 and bank 2 swapped

Bit.Name: IWDG_SW
Bit.Description: IWDG control mode option status bit.
Bit.Val: IWDG watchdog is controlled by hardware
IWDG watchdog is controlled by software

Bit.Description: IWDG control mode option status bit.
Bit.Val: IWDG watchdog is controlled by hardware
IWDG watchdog is controlled by software

Bit.Description: WWDG control mode option status bit.

Bit.Description: WWDG control mode option status bit.
Bit.Val: WWDG watchdog is controlled by hardware
WWDG watchdog is controlled by software

Bit.Name: NRST_STOP
Bit.Description: Core domain Stop entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: a reset is generated when entering Stop mode on core domain
no reset generated when entering Stop mode on core domain

Bit.Description: Core domain Stop entry reset option status bit.
Bit.Val: a reset is generated when entering Stop mode on core domain
no reset generated when entering Stop mode on core domain

Bit.Name: BL_COM_CFG
Bit.Description: Bootloader interface selection/configuration

Bit.Name: BL_COM_CFG
Bit.Description: Bootloader interface selection/configuration

Bit.Name: SRAM1_RST
Bit.Description: SRAM1 erase upon system reset

Values.Val: SRAM1 erased when a system reset occurs
SRAM1 not erased when a system reset occurs

Bit.Name: SRAM2_ECC
Bit.Description: ECC in SRAM2 region configuration bit

Values.Val: SRAM2 ECC check enabled
SRAM2 ECC check disabled

Bit.Name: SRAM2_RST
Bit.Description: SRAM2 erase when system reset

Values.Val: SRAM2 erase when system reset occurs
SRAM2 not erased when a system reset occurs

Bit.Name: SRAM1_RST
Bit.Description: SRAM1 erase upon system reset

Values.Val: SRAM1 erased when a system reset occurs
SRAM1 not erased when a system reset occurs

Bit.Name: SRAM2_ECC
Bit.Description: ECC in SRAM2 region configuration bit

Values.Val: SRAM2 ECC check enabled

Bit.Name: SRAM2_RST
Bit.Description: SRAM2 erase when system reset

Values.Val: SRAM2 erased when system reset occurs
SRAM2 not erased when a system reset occurs

Bit.Name: BOOTADD
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Address

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK
Bit.Description: A field locking the values of BOOT0, BOOT_SEL, SWAP_BANK, and BOOTADD settings

Values.Val: The BOOT0, BOOT_SEL, SWAP_BANK, and BOOTADD can still be modified following their individual rules
The BOOT0, BOOT_SEL, SWAP_BANK, and BOOTADD are frozen

Bit.Name: BOOTADD
Bit.Description: Unique Boot Entry Address

Bit.Name: BOOT_LOCK

Values.Val: The BOOT0, BOOT_SEL, SWAP_BANK, and BOOTADD can still be modified following their individual rules
The BOOT0, BOOT_SEL, SWAP_BANK, and BOOTADD are frozen
